short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to block website domains and specific pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to enter websites. Those websites then get replaced with a ASCII emojis that change every 0.5 seconds.
